channel.title: Need Help Fixing something
channel.description:
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutofMemoryError: Java heap space.
Is this because: Theres an actual error Or because: Im out of memory in Java Or because: My Pc isn't the quickest?
If its because theres an error how do i fix this If its the memory how do I Supply Java with more of my Computers processing power If its because My PC isnt the quickest well, just tell me ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 26, 2006, 09:52:25 AM[/size][hr]A little help I have people wanting to play on my server...[br][size=1]Posted at: October 26, 2006, 09:57:13 AM[/size][hr]Ok... No1 is willing to help me...

item.title: Need Help Fixing something
item.dc:creator: @HelpmePl0x HelpmePl0x
item.description:
@HelpmePl0x wrote:

I actually read your guide.
I added all the variables and I will post back later with The result.
It no longer comes up The system cannot find the path specified.
But it may still come up with my original problem, will post back results.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 05:03:08 AM[/size][hr]Ok, No1 can log in and if i change it to:
@echo off
COLOR 08
title cruxscape.no-ip.org Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_08injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
Then it comes up with:
The system cannot find the path specified.
Ima add the other line of code and post back results…[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 05:15:20 AM[/size][hr]Ooook May have fixed this…
Not 100% sure…
Will post results my results…
People are logging in :D[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 05:18:54 AM[/size][hr]NOPE:
STILL I GET THIS STUPID ERROR MESSAGE
Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.OutofMemoryError: Java heap space.
I NEED HELP> I SET ALL THE VARIABLES AND CHANGED THE CODE OF MY RUNSERVER <STILL NOT WORKING.
I might change Source but I was using Testscape which is a good one…[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 05:43:21 AM[/size][hr]Any help off ne1 else?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 09:00:56 AM[/size][hr]Does no1 else understand why this message is occuring?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 09:07:21 AM[/size][hr]Ok I may well have fixed it will post back results.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 09:16:09 AM[/size][hr]SOMEONE HELPME

PLEASE

THIS PROBLEM HAS NOT BEEN FIXED

I REALLY NEED YOUR HELP![br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 01:54:41 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE HELP![br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 02:08:36 PM[/size][hr]ANYONE! WHY AREN’T YOU HELPING![br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 02:25:15 PM[/size][hr]

I need help on this issue…

Still unresolved
